definitions.definition: relating to the instincts, physiological processes, and activities connected with physical attraction or intimate physical contact between individuals.
examples: she had felt the thrill of a sexual attraction

definitions.definition: of or relating to the two sexes or to gender.
of or characteristic of one sex or the other.
examples: the hormones which control the secondary sexual characteristics

definitions.definition: being of one sex or the other; capable of sexual reproduction.
examples: reproductive, genital, sex, procreative the sexual organs
